attributes.action: Let torbay and Teignbridge show there Christmas lights for charity.
attributes.additional_details: As above to stop them getting fined and raising money for charity. All people want to do is make children happy after the dismal year we have all had.
attributes.background: I want the government to relax the rules on people looking at houses with Christmas lights that are providing one way system, hand sanitiser, People wearing face masks. These people spend a lot of money on people decorating at this festive time of year, don't deserve to be threatened with a fine.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not aware of any restrictions on christmas displays.  
	 
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
